mech.hint: Dein maximaler TP-Wert erhöht sich um 5. Heilung %game.action.heal% 10, selbst.
Your maximum hit point value is increased by 5. Heal %game.action.heal% 10, self.

brute.1: Rested and Ready: Whenever you long rest, add +1 %game.action.move% to your first move ability the following round
brute.2: Cause enemies to suffer a total of 12 or more Retaliate damage during attacks targeting you in a single round
brute.3: Accross three consecutive rounds, play six different ability cards and cause enemies to suffer at least %game.damage:6% on each of your turns

cragheart.1: Earthquakes Whenever a new room is revealed, control all enemies in the newly revealed room: %game.action.move% 1, this movement must end in an empty hex
cragheart.2: Only attack enemies adjacent to obstacles or walls
cragheart.3: Damage or heal at least one ally each round

demolitionist.1: Remodeling Whenever you rest while adjacent to a wall or obstacle, you may place an obstalce in an empty hex within %game.action.range% 2 (of you)
demolitionist.2: Deal 10 or more damage with each of three different attack actions
demolitionist.3: Destroy at least six obstacles. End the scenario with no obstacles on the map other than ones placed by allies

diviner.1: Tip the Scales Whenever you rest, you may look at the top card of one attack modifier deck, then you may %game.elementHalf.consume:dark|light% to place one card on the bottom of the deck
diviner.2: During one round, have at least four monsters move into four different Rifts that affect those monsters
diviner.3: Reveal at least one card from at least one ability card deck or attack modifier deck each round

hatchet.1: Hasty Pick-up: Once each scenario, during your turn, if the Favourite is in a hex on the map, you may %game.element.consume.air% to return it to it's ability card
hatchet.2: %game.element.air% or %game.element.consume.air% during each of your turns
hatchet.3: During each round in which there is at least one enemy on the map at the start of your turn, either place one of your tokens on an ability card of yours or on an enemy

mindthief.1: X is half the rat's current hit point value (rounded up).
mindthief.2: Lying Low: You are considered to be last in initiative order when determining monster focus
mindthief.3: Trigger the on-attack effect of four different Augments thrice each
mindthief.4: Never be targeted by an attack

red-guard.1: Brilliant Aegis: Whenever you are attacked, you may %game.element.consume.light% to gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the attack and have the attacker gain disadvantage for the attack
red-guard.2: Kill at least five enemies during their turns
red-guard.3: Force each enemy in the scenario to move at least one hex, forcing at least six enemies to move

scoundrel.1: Cloak of Invisibility: Once each scenario, during your turn, perform "%game.condition.invisible%, self"
scoundrel.2: Kill at least six enemies that are adjacent to at least on of your allies
scoundrel.3: Kill at least six enemies that are adjacent to none of your allies

spellweaver.1: Etheric Bound: Whenever you short rest, if Reviving Ether is in your discard pile, first return it to your hand
spellweaver.2: Infuse and consume all six elements
spellweaver.3: Perform four different loss actions twice each

tinkerer.1: Rejuvenating Vapor: Whenever you long rest, you may perform "%game.action.heal%, %game.action.range% 3"
tinkerer.2: Heal an ally or apply a negative condition to an enemy each turn
tinkerer.3: Perform two actions with lost icons before your first rest and then only rest after having played at least two actions with lost icons since your previous rest

voidwarden.1: Grave Defense: Whenever you rest, you may %game.elementHalf.consume:ice|dark% to give %game.condition.ward% to one ally who has %game.condition.poison%
voidwarden.2: Cause enemies to suffer 20 or more damage in a single turn with granted or commanded attacks
voidwarden.3: Give at least one ally or enemy %game.condition.poison%, %game.condition.strengthen%, %game.condition.bless%, or %game.condition.ward% each round

brute.1: Descansado y listo: Siempre que realices un descanses largo, obtén %game.action.move% +1 a tu primera habilidad de movimiento de la siguiente ronda
brute.2: Provoca que los enemigos sufran un total de 12 o más de daño de Represalia durante los ataques que te tengan como objetivo en una sola ronda
brute.3: A lo largo de tres rondas consecutivas, juega seis cartas de habilidad diferentes y haz que los enemigos sufran al menos %game.damage:6% en cada uno de tus turnos

cragheart.1: Terremotos Siempre que se revele una nueva sala, controla a todos los enemigos de la sala recién revelada: %game.action.move% 1, este movimiento debe terminar en un hexágono vacío
cragheart.2: Ataca solamente a enemigos adyacentes a obstáculos o paredes
cragheart.3: Daña o cura al menos a un aliado cada ronda

demolitionist.1: Remodelación Siempre que descanses mientras estés adyacente a un muro u obstáculo, puedes colocar un obstáculo en un hexágono vacío dentro de %game.action.range% 2 (de ti)
demolitionist.2: Inflige 10 o más daño con tres acciones de ataque diferentes
demolitionist.3: Destruye al menos seis obstáculos. Termina el escenario sin otros obstáculos en el mapa que los colocados por los aliados

diviner.1: Inclinar la balanza Siempre que descanses, puedes mirar la carta superior de un mazo de modificadores de ataque, después puedes %game.elementHalf.consume:dark|light% para colocar una carta en la parte inferior del mazo
diviner.2: Durante una ronda, haz que al menos cuatro monstruos se muevan a cuatro Fisuras diferentes que afecten a esos monstruos
diviner.3: Revela al menos una carta de al menos un mazo de cartas de habilidad o de modificador de ataque cada ronda

hatchet.1: Recogida apresurada: Una vez en cada escenario, durante tu turno, si el Favorito está en un hexágono del mapa, puedes %game.element.consume.air% devolverlo a su carta de habilidad
hatchet.2: %game.element.air% o %game.element.consume.air% durante cada uno de tus turnos
hatchet.3: Durante cada ronda en la que haya al menos un enemigo en el mapa al comienzo de tu turno, coloca una de tus fichas en una carta de habilidad tuya o en una carta de habilidad enemiga

mindthief.1: X es la mitad del valor actual de puntos de vida de la rata (redondeado hacia arriba).
mindthief.2: Pasar inadvertido: Se considera que eres el último en orden de iniciativa al determinar la atención de los monstruos
mindthief.3: Activa el efecto de ataque de cuatro mejoras diferentes tres veces cada una
mindthief.4: Nunca ser el objetivo de un ataque

red-guard.1: Egida brillante: Siempre que te ataquen, puedes %game.element.consume.light% para obtener %game.action.shield% 1 para ese ataque y hacer que el atacante obtenga desventaja
red-guard.2: Mata al menos a cinco enemigos durante sus turnos
red-guard.3: Obliga a cada enemigo del escenario a moverse al menos un hexágono, forzando al menos a seis enemigos a moverse

scoundrel.1: Capa de invisibilidad: Una vez en cada escenario, durante tu turno, realiza «%game.condition.invisible%, personal»
scoundrel.2: Mata al menos a seis enemigos que estén adyacentes a al menos uno de tus aliados
scoundrel.3: Mata al menos a seis enemigos que no estén adyacentes a ninguno de tus aliados

spellweaver.1: Vínculo Etéreo: Siempre que realizes un descanso corto, si Éter revitalizante está en tu pila de descartes, devuélvelo a tu mano
spellweaver.2: Infunde y consume los seis elementos
spellweaver.3: Realiza cuatro acciones de pérdida diferentes dos veces cada una

tinkerer.1: Vapor rejuvenecedor: Siempre que realices un descanses largo, puedes realizar «%game.action.heal%, %game.action.range% 3»
tinkerer.2: Cura a un aliado o aplica una condición negativa a un enemigo cada turno
tinkerer.3: Realiza dos acciones con iconos de perdida antes de tu primer descanso y después descansa sólo tras haber jugado al menos dos acciones con iconos de perdida desde tu descanso anterior

voidwarden.1: Protección Funeraria: Siempre que descanses, puedes %game.elementHalf.consume:ice|dark% para dar %game.condition.ward% a un aliado que tenga %game.condition.poison%
voidwarden.2: Causa a los enemigos 20 o más de daño en un solo turno con ataques concedidos o comandados
voidwarden.3: Da al menos a un aliado o enemigo %game.condition.poison%, %game.condition.strengthen%, %game.condition.bless% o %game.condition.ward% en cada ronda

blood-pact.hint: Suffer %game.damage:1% at the start of each of your turns.

careless-charge.hint: You are immune to all negative conditions.

unbridled-power.hint: You may overheal to a maximum of 26 hit points, but your maximum hit point value.

song_active.hint: Gain 1 XP at start of each of your turns.

angry-face.1: Marked for the Hunt: At the beginning of each round in which you long rest, you may choose one ally to gain the benefits of any of your active Dooms as if the Dooms were in that ally's active area for the round
angry-face.2: Never perform a Doom action that you have already performed in the scenario
angry-face.3: Kill three Doomed enemies during one of your turn

beetle.1: Heart of Swarm: Once per scenario on your turn, play a card from your discard pile to perform Cultivate %data.action.custom.cs-cultivate% action of that card. You and all allies adjacent to you are considered to be adjecent to every colony type this round
beetle.2: For an entire scenario, have the persistent effect of a Cultivate %data.action.custom.cs-cultivate% ability trigger each round (only count gaining %game.action.shield% or %game.action.retaliate% if attacked)
beetle.3: In a single round, cause 15 or more damage with retaliate (including retailiate you grant)

bleeding-claw.1: Lull in Hunger: Once each scenario, become %game.action.custom.cs-sated% after collecting your fifth loot token
bleeding-claw.2: Andrenaline Rush: Become %game.action.custom.cs-sated% each time you lose a card to negate suffering %game.action.damage%
bleeding-claw.3: Follow the Scent: Whenever one of your abilities causes at least one enemy to gain %game.condition.rupture%, immiditiately after the ability, perform %game.action.move%
bleeding-claw.4: For an entire scenario, be %game.action.custom.cs-sated% at the start or end of each of your turns
bleeding-claw.5: %game.action.push% one enemy 7 or more hexes with a single attack

chain-helmet.1: Unyielding Jailer: You may have an additional enemy Shackled %data.characterIcon.chain-helmet% at any time
chain-helmet.2: Shackle %data.characterIcon.chain-helmet% 30 different enemies accross any number of scenarios
chain-helmet.3: Deal %game.damage:20% to Shackled %data.characterIcon.chain-helmet% enemies in a single round

circles.4: Phase Out: Once each scenario during ordering of initiative, after all ability cards haven been revealed, all your summons gain %game.condition.invisible%
circles.5: Summon the Lava Golem on your first turn and keep it alive for the entire scenario
circles.6: Perform the summon action of five different ability cards

crescent-sun.1: Ignited Power: Whenever you perform an action with a %game.card.lost% icon, you may immiditately play a card from your hand to perform an action that has a Glow %data.characterIcon.crescent-sun% ability
crescent-sun.2: For an entire scenario, on each of your turns except the first, perform at least one Glow %data.characterIcon.crescent-sun% ability
crescent-sun.3: In a single scenario, generate 4 different elements in a single turn and consume 4 different elements in a single turn

eclipse.1: Empowering Night At the start of the scenario, you may discard two cards to add a card with an action containing a persistent symbol from your pool to your hand and immediately play it, performing that action
eclipse.2: Have %game.condition.invisible% at the start or end of each of your turns
eclipse.3: %game.element.dark% or %game.element.consume.dark% during each of your turns

envx.1: All adjacent allies may perform "%game.action.move%1" at end of turn.
envx.2: All adjacent allies and enemies suffer %game.damage:2% ad end of turn.
envx.4: X is the number of adjacent figures.
envx.5: All adjacent enemies deduct -1 %game.action.attack% from all their attacks.
envx.6: All adjacent summoned allies add +1 %game.action.attack% to all their attacks
envx.7: Add +2 %game.action.attack% when the target is adjacent to any of your allies
envx.8: Add %game.condition.disarm% when the target is affected by a negative condition.
envx.9: Spinning Up: At the start of your first turn each scenario, you may play one card from your hand to perform a persistent loss action of that card.
envx.10: Perform two different summon actions on your first turn and keep all summons from those actions alive for the entire scenario.
envx.11: Perform three different non-summon persistent loss actions before your first rest.

flask.1: Spark of Inspiration: Whenever you long rest, after you revocer your cards from your discard pile, you may play one card from your hand to perform all persistent abilities on either the top or bottom action of the card
flask.2: For an entire scenario, generate or consume an element on each of your turns
flask.3: In a single scenario, move your character token off of the last slot of 6 different persistent abilities

lightning.1: Rapid Recovery: Whenever you heal from a long rest, add +1 %game.action.heal%
lightning.2: Lose at least one hit point during each of your turns, without ever performing the bottom action of Blood Pact
lightning.3: Have exactly one hit point at the end of each of your turns

music-note.1: Storyteller: At the end of each scenario, each character in that scenario gains 8 experience if you successfully completed your battle goal
music-note.2: On your first turn of the scenario and the turn after each of your rests, perform one Song action that you have not yet performed this scenario
music-note.3: Havel all 10 monster %game.condition.curse% cards and all 10 %game.condition.bless% cards in modifier decks at the same time

saw.1: Revitalizing Medicine: Whenever an ally performs the Heal ability of Medical Pack or Large Medical Pack, that character may first remove one negative condition
saw.2: On each of your turns, give an ally an ability card, target an ally with a heal ability, grant an ally shield, or place an ability card in an ally's active area
saw.3: Deal at least %game.damage:20% with a single attack ability

squidface.1: Xorn's Boon: Once each scenario, during your turn, cause each enemy that has %game.condition.poison% to duffer %game.damage:1% and gain %game.condition.muddle% and each ally who has %game.condition.poison% to suffer %game.damage:1% to gain %game.condition.strengthen%
squidface.2: Kill at least five enemies with non-attack abilities
squidface.3: Perform three different attack abilities that target at least four enemies each

sun.1: Shielding Light: Whenever one of your heals would cause an ally's current hit point value to increase beyond their maximum hit point value, that ally gains %game.condition.ward%
sun.2: Reduce attacks targeting you by a total of 20 or more through Shield effects in a single round
sun.3: %game.element.light% or %game.element.consume.light% during each of your turns

target.1: Emergency Emplacement: Whenever you short rest, you may gain Immobilize to immiditially resolve any of your active Projectile abilities.
target.2: In a single scenario, successfully resolve 4 different Projectile abilities twice each
target.3: For an entire scenario, deal more damage with retaliate than you suffer whenever you are attacked, and be targeted by at least 5 attacks

three-spears.1: Well Supplied: Once each scenario, during your turn, if you have a persistend Quartermaster ability card in your active area, you may recover up to four cards from your discard pile
three-spears.2: Spend, lose, or refresh one or more items on each of your turns without ever performing the top action of Reinforced Steel
three-spears.3: Loot six or more loot tokens in a single turn

tools.1: Spare Parts: At the start of each scenario, you may lose one %game.itemSlot:head%, %game.itemSlot:legs%, %game.itemSlot:onehand%, or %game.itemSlot:twohand% item for no effect to gain 2 %data.action.custom.cs-tool%
tools.2: In a single scenario, gain or spend at least 1 %data.action.custom.cs-tool% each round
tools.3: In a signle scenario, lose 12 %game.itemSlot:head%, %game.itemSlot:legs%, %game.itemSlot:onehand%, and %game.itemSlot:twohand% items

triangles.1: You may perform Attack actions as if you occupy the summon's hex.
triangles.3: Elemental Proficiency: At the start of each scenario and whenever you long rest, %game.element.wild%
triangles.4: Consume at least two different elements with each of four different attack abilities without ever performing the bottom action of Formless Power of Shaping in Ether
triangles.5: Infuse five or more elements during one of your turns, then consume five or more elements during your following turn

two-mini.1: All adjacent allies add +2 %game.action.attack% to all their attacks.
two-mini.2: Bear Treat: During each round in which you long rest, at initiative 99, you may skip the bear's normal turn to Command: "%game.action.move%3; %game.action.loot%1; If the loot ability was performed: %gamae.action.heal%3, self"
two-mini.3: Have your bear summon deal 10 or more damage in three consecutive rounds
two-mini.4: You or your summons must apply a negative condition to at least 10 different enemies

blood-pact.hint: Sufres %game.damage:1% al inicio de cada uno de tus turnos.

careless-charge.hint: Eres inmune a todas los estados negativos.

unbridled-power.hint: Puedes sobrecalentarte hasta un máximo de 26 puntos de vida, pero tu valor máximo de puntos de golpe.

song_active.hint: Obtén 1 Exp al inicio de cada uno de sus turnos.

angry-face.2: Never perform a Doom action that you have already performed in the scenario
angry-face.3: Kill three Doomed enemies during one of your turn

beetle.2: For an entire scenario, have the persistent effect of a Cultivate %data.action.custom.cs-cultivate% ability trigger each round (only count gaining %game.action.shield% or %game.action.retaliate% if attacked)
beetle.3: In a single round, cause 15 or more damage with retaliate (including retailiate you grant)

bleeding-claw.4: For an entire scenario, be %game.action.custom.cs-sated% at the start or end of each of your turns
bleeding-claw.5: %game.action.push% one enemy 7 or more hexes with a single attack

circles.6: Perform the summon action of five different ability cards

envx.11: Perform three different non-summon persistent loss actions before your first rest.

tools.2: In a single scenario, gain or spend at least 1 %data.action.custom.cs-tool% each round

triangles.3: Elemental Proficiency: At the start of each scenario and whenever you long rest, %game.element.wild%
triangles.4: Consume at least two different elements with each of four different attack abilities without ever performing the bottom action of Formless Power of Shaping in Ether
triangles.5: Infuse five or more elements during one of your turns, then consume five or more elements during your following turn

two-mini.2: Bear Treat: During each round in which you long rest, at initiative 99, you may skip the bear's normal turn to Command: "%game.action.move%3; %game.action.loot%1; If the loot ability was performed: %gamae.action.heal%3, self"
two-mini.3: Have your bear summon deal 10 or more damage in three consecutive rounds
two-mini.4: You or your summons must apply a negative condition to at least 10 different enemies
